intent_atoms.description: Automate strict concurrency checks across all build and test targets
All targets compile with strict concurrency enabled (zero warnings)
Pre-push hook verifies concurrency compliance before every push
CI workflow runs dedicated strict concurrency job with artifact uploads
Strict concurrency checks must always be enforced during build and test phases

functional_units.name: Strict Concurrency Build Target Configuration
functional_units.description: Enables strict concurrency checks for all build and test targets via .enableUpcomingFeature("StrictConcurrency") in Package.swift

functional_units.name: Pre-Push Hook for Concurrency Compliance
functional_units.description: A Git hook that verifies strict concurrency compliance before every push

functional_units.name: CI Workflow Strict Concurrency Job
functional_units.description: GitHub Actions workflow that runs a dedicated job to check strict concurrency and uploads artifacts

functional_units.name: Documentation Update for Automation Gate
functional_units.description: Updates PRD and related docs to reflect the established automation gate for strict concurrency checks

functional_units.name: Quality Logs Directory with .gitignore Rules
functional_units.description: Creates a directory for quality logs and configures .gitignore rules to manage log files
